title: Weary (4C212)
text:
Set:	The Two Towers
Kind:	Shadow
Culture:	Isengard
Twilight:	1
Card Type:	Condition
Game Text:	Search. Plays on a companion or ally. Limit 1 per character. Each time the Free Peoples player assigns bearer to skirmish an [Isengard] tracker, bearer must exert.
Lore:	”'We shall not turn back here.'”
Rarity:	C
